name: Spelly Hat
description:
A mini game where you play as a wizard cat with magical wand. You can smash spider enemies or shoot them with fireballs!!. But never touch from sides.

You need to collect all gems and then reach flag for the next level.

If you loose all health, game ends and you should restart from level1!

If you fall, level restarts automatically.

6 levels on different scenes.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys for left, right and jump. Space for fireball. Escape for pause(or button from screen)
